attributes.action: Make "Travelers" Acountable for their Actions and the Law Equal for All.
attributes.additional_details:
The Law should be the Same for All, the Tax payers pay for costs they cause, they lift out Fencing to gain access, Criminal Damage, they enjoy Churning up Football fields, Fly Tipping, Abuse With No Action taken against them and Biased.

They Need to Pay for their Actions like anyone else.

Let's get things Corrected as they Cause May Thousands each year and Laugh at the so Called Law against them.

This has gone on for far to long now.
attributes.background: At this time so called Travelers get away with Criminal Damage and the Costs involved in getting them removed and clearing their Mess and Damage, plus the fact they cause issues with the Locals and get away with it, the Police are Frightened to upset them but others would be Arrested and to Court.
